title: 326. Pursuing Excellence: 4th Of July Special
itunes:title: 326. Pursuing Excellence: 4th Of July Special
description: America needs you to be excellent. In today's episode, Andy talks about the opportunities we have right in front of us, how we can help each other pursue excellence and why mental toughness & discipline will play a crucial role in the success of our country.
content:encoded: America needs you to be excellent. In today's episode, Andy talks about the opportunities we have right in front of us, how we can help each other pursue excellence and why mental toughness & discipline will play a crucial role in the success of our country.
